item.title: Inter-Agency R Users bi-monthly meeting
item.dc:creator: Wendy Martinez
item.description: Video information is sent out via the email list.

item.title: Inter-Agency R Users bi-monthly meeting
item.dc:creator: Wendy Martinez
item.description: The meeting will be held Sept 13 at 1pm EST. Video information is sent out via the email list.

item.title: R Workflow for Scientists
item.dc:creator: Eli Holmes
item.description: 1-hour workshops on Fridays in June and July 2021. Workshops on GitHub and R packages geared towards federal scientists.

item.title: Government Advances in Statistical Programming workshop
item.dc:creator: Nathan
item.description: Nov 6, 2020 A workshop focused on statistical programming for government applications across government and the private sector.

item.title: BigSurv20
item.dc:creator: Nathan
item.description: Virtual Nov-Dec 2020. BigSurv is an opportunity for social scientists, survey methodologists, statisticians and others with an interest in computer and data science to meet, interact, exchange ideas, collaborate, and learn from each other.

item.title: R for Social Scientists
item.dc:creator: Emily Markowitz
item.description: Sept 22-24, 2020. virtual workshop by NOAA Fisheries social scientists. Focus on data analysis and advanced topics.
